评论详情: So these are great, yes BUT… They fit incredibly weird. If your are 6’ or below MAKE SURE YOU GET the SHORT model. The regular model is longgg I mean like 6’5 long.  These do fit kind of strange especially if you have larger or muscular thighs you’ll notice that the size you need will fit perfect but be a bit loose around the waist.  BUT there are drawstrings so you can tighten and make them snug. Is this ideal? No, but it’s the only way I’ve learned with these as I know multiple people who have them. It seems a little stiff material wise at first but give it a couple washes and these will be so soft it’s crazy. They aren’t very stretchy at all. The ripstop quality is really nice and strong preventing normal rips that would occur. Honestly yes these are made for nurses but these are great for just hot weather environments too. I even got my grandfather a pair.

评论概述: Good scrubs.  Love the cargo pockets.
评论详情: I've been a nurse for 34 years.  These are one of my favorite scrub pants. I love the cargo pockets.  They are comfortable and look good.  However, they don't last as long as other brands that I wear.  That's okay.  I will still buy these Carhartt's occasionally.

Cargo pants are the most comfortable pants I've used to work on vehicles, then again I wear them everywhere anyways so I like to have higher quality pants that don't rip like Carhartt for the job. The price is good too for the quality, a lot of people must agree cause it seems difficult for them to keep their pants in stock.
Fit was so tight in legs. I have a 32” waist but big legs and these are not comfortable. These are not relaxed fit.

Got these for work and the side cargo pockets stitching quickly began to tear. So now I got to be careful of what I add to the side pocket cause it can fall out. Otherwise they have held up. They’re pretty comfortable to wear for a 12hr shift. I did have to go up a size cause they don’t have any give so keep that in mind

评论概述: warning these are not rugged. they are like thin sweatpants.
评论详情: thin and drawstring tie. like medical scrubs.
Low quality  stitching  pants ripped once then repaired myself  and totally  ripped  in another  location  very cheap not durable  or ripstop as advertised
I mean… they’re Carhartt! They are so flattering and hubby says they’re super comfortable and flexible. Perfect for running errands, but starting stylish and comfortable.
I bought 2 of these pants after couple washes, they started to tear between the leg/groin area...they need to make them more durable. Price was little high for quality.

评论概述: There's no pants on these pants!
评论详情: WHERE'S THE PANTS!? That's what I want to know. What I got is some black-colored tissue-paper thin single-use joke trousers.  I expected a lot better, especially at the premium Carhartt price from these scrubs.  The material is 0.35mm thick, if you include the plastic bag that I didn't even bother taking them out of because I'm sending them back to amazon.  411 grams in weight. That's pathetic. There's no material in these.  I've tired out multiple no-name Chinese brand rip-stop cargo pants here on Amazon and gotten much better results, and at cheaper prices. I would suggest you do the same.
I bought these for work as light weight work pants for summer. But the pockets were a bit shallow for what I needed.
Perfect! Fit great and strong material
I like the pants, but order a size smaller than usual.
Practically designed to be appropriate size.

I didn't think the quality was there .The fabric is thin and they just don't seem like Car heart pants. I don't like them. They are too thin for winter pants. I don't think they are a good value.I know my son won't wear them.

I am an ER RN. I was not happy with the run of the mill scrubs, they could be light weight and thin. These Carharett's are extremely durable and tough and last a good while. I have been using them now for about 8-10yrs. Hard to beat Amazon price too

评论概述: Great price and quality for TALL size pants
评论详情: I purchased these for my husband who works as a chef and need multiple pockets and something very durable. I did not know Carthartt made these types of pants and coincidentally found these in my search for pants. He’s a tall man and finding these in tall sizes as well was a PLUS because those types of pants are already hard to find. I purchased 4 of them because the price for them was not bad. He’s been using them for approximately 3 weeks now and he loves them. Another plus that we discovered was how soft they get after they are washed the first time. Very satisfied with this purchase.
Good Fit and appear very durable.
They go on great but they re tight in the crotch.  When i go to sit down its very uncomfortable.
Ordered the size suggested by the chart.  Way too small.  Couldn't even pull them over my thighs.

These pants are well made but are too stiff with no stretch what so ever. The way they look in the pictures look softer but aren’t that soft in person.  Edited after two months: after putting them through several washes they are really soft now and have far more stretch than the first time I tried them on. They are still strong and I’d recommend these to anyone who has patience lol.

ripped so easy. knelt down and the crotch stitching held but the material to the side ripped a good 5-6 inches to the side of the zipper and down. these are baggy on me as well so no reason for it to rip that easily

评论详情: The pants fit well and are comfortable.  Unfortunately they attract and show every bit of lint, dust, and pet hair they come in contact with.  They're unwearable.
The fitting and all is perfect and authentic, true to the carhartt spirit, just that it took inexplicably long for the pants to be delivered.

The absolute most comfortable pants I own!! I Love the rip stop material, boot-cut leg openings, drawstring waist and short leg length option that is available. With a multitude of pocket options my only complaint would be that there is no back left pocket, only a right. Love the color options as well! My favorite is the olive green at the moment...

评论概述: Best scrub pants money can buy
评论详情: Carhartt does not disappoint. These are hands down the best scrub pants on the planet!!

Bought the pants and top as a set. Ordered the same size as my previous set. These are made well and the dark gray is a nice change from basic black. Only complaint is that the new version of these fit quite a bit looser. I ordered small in both the top and bottom which is the same as my last pair. My older ones were a couple of years old and they fit really well. More of an athletic cut. The new version has a much fuller cut and look. The top is quite baggy, even with a small. I ordered the small pants and they are still quite large and baggy. I’m 5’5” and should have ordered the extra small pants. The top only goes to a small. Overall they are made quite well. Just know they run quite large.

评论概述: Poor fit for me and wierd pockets.
评论详情: I just tried these on for five minutes. they were not at all comfortable and the pocket arrangements were strange. I returned them and ordered the Wrangler Authentics cargo pants which fit fine and still have a cell phone pocket behind the left cargo pocket which the description fails to mention. I had to submit questions about the cell phone pocket which thankfully several people responded that the pocket was there.

These pants were recommended by a former medic turned nurse. I bought for the belt loops. The fabric retains its color after several washes, feels comfortable against my skin. Haven’t observed any holes appearing. Still fits true to size.  The side pockets are in a great position for my shears.
Well built and versatile for the price
Fit was true to size and there are belt loops as well as drawstring
Good quality material and very comfortable to wear.
Thanks :)
Amazing slacks and light weight. I got these for traveling as they aren’t bulky.
I like the way they feel, but this happened day. 1 Don't think I'd recommend.

评论概述: Waist sizing all over the place!
评论详情: I like the pants, the pockets & the light weight rip stop fabric. They do not fit me at all. The sizing guide says small is 28 to 30 inch waist. It is 33! Have 3 pair and ALL have waists over 30 inches at a minimum. Why have elastic when you need a belt to hold them up. Generally saggy & baggy on me. I wear 30-30 Levi’s 501’s.

I just started wearing these and first day first pair the crotch ripped right where the zipper meets the inseam. I notice another reviewer that stated the same problem.  They seam really nice comfortable and of good material but the crotch seams are lacking in the durability department. Literally 4 hours after I put a brand new pair the crotch blew out. I’m 6-1 210# athletic build. Very disappointed that I bought 6 pair

These are not the same scrubs that I purchased about 3 years ago!!  I absolutely loved my last 4 pair and because I have to wash and wear them everyday the old ones were beginning to show some wear so I purchased new ones.  These are not the same!!  I'm a physical therapist and have to do a lot of bending, squatting, etc.. and These are so uncomfortable!  The old material would stretch and give but these have zero stretch to the material and are just plain old uncomfortable!!  I hate when companies change up the materials or how they make something!! Bring back the old ones!!
Pockets aren't deep enough for a phone
Value is great, deep pockets. Moveable fabric

I bought multiple pairs of these for my new job. Barely wore them for 3 weeks and had 2 pairs rip in the crotch.  I don't expect much, but I expect at least that. Its the most wild and problematic place to rip, incredibility  embarrassing, would highly recommend NOT buying these.

The pants hang too low on my waist and requires a belt. And the large front pockets aren’t deep enough so my phone keeps falling out when I’m driving. Other than that they’re good quality pants for cold or cooler weather. A little too warm for hot weather. I would return if I could.
Thicker material than most and plenty of pockets. I haven't personally noticed any premature wear

Carhart is known for longevity and durability in its line. I ordered these pants twice.  After the second order, several months apart, I come to realize I will not order these again.  The fit is strange!  The length is great, the waist is too big. Using the drawstring to hold up the pants doesn’t work well. Especially if you put anything of moderate weight in your pockets. The pants will slide off your waist and you will spend a considerable amount of time pulling them back up in place.  If you use a belt with the belt loops, in addition to the pull strings, the front button will come undone leaving you with a pouch of unbuttoned pants, untucked shirt, and a belt buckle pushed against your skin.  Squatting down in these pants for anyone that has decent muscle tone in your thighs is not that great.  Forget about putting a cell phone in your front pocket and trying to squat down. The pockets are so short and tight, the phone in your pocket will prevent you from squatting.The color after several washes did not fade, the style with cargo pockets is a must for me working in the medical field, and the thickness of the material is definitely great quality.  All in all, I after several wears, i consistently feel like I am being packed up for shipping due to the tighter fit of this brand

评论概述: Comfortable fit, started to fray after one day of work.
评论详情: The cuffs of the pants started to fray after one day. Comfortable, lightweight, good for trimming the property on a hot summer day, but just didn't hold up.

I own 4 pairs of these pants. They are extremely comfortable. The material holds up to everything I put them through at work and then wash up clean. The main problem is that the seam in the crotches have ripped out in all 4.

Ok, first, yes these are scrubs! But they are pretty durable and have multiple pockets for tools, small materials or whatever. I'm in construction and have to wear pants. These are lightweight and Carhartt! I would recommend trying at least 1 pair out if you are looking for lightweight work pants for construction

First of all the feel.. good stuff. I'm 6"4 with a 36 waist and the Large Tall is perfect. I work in the kitchen and all the pockets are more than help. The loose fit is super comfy, and the belt loops option is a plus. Totally recommend these.

I always buy Carhartt Ripstop men's scrub pants. I like that I can order a LARGE SHORT, since I have a short inseam, it falls close to my inseam. (Versus just ordering Large, which then are too long and I need to hem them or pay to hem them.) So, that is a huge plus for me that I appreciate. Plenty of pockets. Yes, a zipper pocket somewhere would be nice, but for me, not a deal breaker either. I have purchased Carhart Ripstop exclusively since 2014, when I came across them at a local Nurse clothing store. I will only buy these even if the hospital keeps pushing staff to purchase a pre-selected brand in order to homogenize the staff uniforms. I HATE THESE NEW BREATHABLE FABRICS!!!! THEY DO NOT TRAP HEAT AT ALL !!! Only cotton, which Carhartt has, keeps me warm. It is total BS that hospitals expect staff to buy the stretchy, type fabric . Even the jackets made from that material do not keep me warm. I recommend Carhartt completely. Very durable. Hold their color and abuse of multi-washings and dryings. Love the multi-pockets. And love the loose fit. Love the elastic waist band that also have belt loops and the draw string. I mean, it still has some quality, which is thankfully. still part of Carhartt's brand. Thanks Carhartt.
inconvenient velcro in back pockets!!
Great pants for cooking in and outside of work

评论概述: nothing is safe in the pockets
评论详情: There is not one button or Velcro closing on any of the pockets.  I can put my cell phone in the deepest pocket and when I sit down in the car the phone falls on the floor.  They have more pockets than I have bothered to count but near as I can tell they are useless.  The overall fit is reasonably good and I like the material.
However these are described as relaxed fit and they don't appear to be. I have been wearing size large (different brand) in scrubs for 12 years and these are the most restrictive I've ever had on.

Do not like these at all. Wish i had returned them. They have beltloops and cargo pockets but they are in fact scrub pants - wirh a draw string. Loose and baggy. Ill fitting. Feels like i'm wearing pajamas

I bought the large shirt pants as I’m not blessed with height.  The pants may be short but the cargo pockets are attached to the leg too low.  When you go to sit down and you have flushes in your pocket, they either try and poke out the bottom or get pushed out the top and on to the floor.  How hard is it to place the pockets higher on the thighs so it doesn’t try to lock your legs into a straight splint ??

These pants are ripstop, super comfortable, and have several pockets. You can wear them with a belt or use the drawstrings (I prefer a belt). The only real criticism is that the cargo pockets do not zip, snap, velcro, or button closed. They stay open. It's not a deal-breaker, and stuff doesn't fall out as easily as I thought it might! The only stain I ever got on a pair of these pants was from industrial strength bleach, and the stains aren't too bad. I would definitely buy these pants again if the price is right!

I was so hoping these were ripstop pants, especially from Carhartt. I was bending down one of the first times I wore these pants, and they ripped.  So disappointed. And now I am past the time to have them replaced.
Soft and comfortable to wear
Perfect fit
Great work pants. Comfortable and durable

评论概述: My favorite scrub pants for men
评论详情: I have been wearing these specific pants to work (in healthcare) for at least the past 10 years. They are very rugged but comfortable. My waist is size 34 and I like the size large regular pant. The pant waist is big but you can cinch them tight with the drawstrings. I only buy the black color because I like to match it with another brand top and black usually gives the closest match. The pants have tons of pockets which is awesome. I’ve tried so many scrub pants and these are by far my favorite. Recommended.

评论概述: Not possible to order ROYAL in size XS.
评论详情: Update: Just like the other reviewer for royal blue XS. I tried ordering this 3 times this year and each time got size LARGE. The 3 replacements to “fix” the error were also all LARGE.  Clearly stated the problem and how to fix it on multiple avenues and amazon personal. Was told it would be forwarded to a team that would take care of it. (Hint: that team doesn’t exist, if it did. All they would have to do is delete one letter.. just one to fix this.)  So much wasted time and money packaging and delivering, returning, packing, replacement delivery, returning. Rinse and repeat.  How to fix?  DELETE THE “L” IN THE TITLE!!  Done.  Old review for black XS: I bought a pair of XS locally back in 2016 and those were some rugged pants for sure! My favorite so I bought the SMALL here because it was on sale. Here are some observations.  The XS were made in Vietnam. This SMall is made in Bangladesh. Handling and comparing them both its easy to tell the new stuff doesn’t feel as “heavy duty”. This new fabric is not as heavyweight evidenced by XS and SMALL size pants BOTH weighing approx. 0.8lbs. Although thinner, the material on these new pants do feel a lot “smoother”. (Like comparing 300 thread count sheets to 1000 Egyptian cotton feel).  I’m disappointed the quality isn’t the same, but that is the expected trajectory once a brand establishes their name. Cut cost/maximize profits. Plus, the lowering of quality is across the board affecting all industries- Japanese & German hand tools for example…  I don’t like it, but I get it.  With that said, these still are the best scrubs IMO.

I'm not sure what these are actually made for. Pajama pants maybe?  The cargo pockets have no clips, buttons or any way to close them. They are just wide open pockets. Make sure you never lean over, sit or walk quickly. Also there is no left back pocket. Officially the worst pair of pants I've ever laid my eyes on. Paper thin, cheap material and just all around poorly made. Please don't buy these. Don't even buy these pants for someone you dislike.

评论概述: If you’re a dude with anything more than Hank Hill butt beware
评论详情: Pants fit great at waist and through legs but if you have anything more than a flat line from your lower back to thighs, these will fit really tight around the hip section, and they don’t stretch the slightest

I’m 6’ 4” and wear 32x36 pants so I went with the X-Large and it’s a little baggy and definitely loose around the waist but I like it to be baggy so that was good and it was easy to tighten with the draw string. Great quality great look

I'm 6 foot 2 inches 220 pounds. These fit great and would still fit well if I werr 3 or 4 inches taller. The pockets are great and it's thicker material so I don't feel like I'm working in some pajamas

评论概述: Sizes don’t fit the same as they used to
评论详情: I bought carhartt scrubs in the past loved them, solid construction, made well and were able to move in them.  Unfortunately the same size large pants fit too snug as if they were slim fit, and not able to to move well. Won’t be buying carhartts anymore. Very dissatisfied. Insult to injury I bought 6 pairs and didn’t even try them on as they were the same size as the old ones which fit well.  Now I am stuck with 6 scrub pants that are not great to work in.

I've purchased many scrub style pants recently and so far these were unfortunately the worst fit-wise.  The material is great, very hard to wrinkle, tough but thin, and quite stain resistant however they have quirks to the fitment and was just no good for me personally which I was quite sad about as the inseam was perfect which for these types of pants is hit or miss.  The band has essentially no stretch and the ties seems like a decoration as they don't actually seem to tighten them much (also very short)  As mentioned before the inseam was perfect for a pair of XXLs as without having to adjust the hems they sit right below my ankles.  The real issue for me was right at the top of my thighs, after 8 hours it felt like I had just hiked up a mountain, massive chafing.  In conclusion for this particular pair I would actually go up one more size if you usually run an XXL/2XL.
As expected!
True to size, comfortable.
Well made, comfortable and come out of the washer/dryer pretty much wrinkle free. I will stick with buying Carhartt scrubs from here on out. A little more expensive but worth it.
